nodes.text: Look, I'm just a guy, not the guy in charge - that's Darion. He's the one you want. He's got this thing about Shady Sands and that old bitch Tandi. He's got a hideout in Vault 15, even got the locals thinking he's on their side.  That's all I know. Honest!
What the hell? You're trying to kill me! Guard!
You're wasting your time. I ain't got word one to say to you or anybody else.
No way! I’m not falling for this trick. BANG! – shot down while escaping. Forget it!
Really, I don't know anything else! I told you everything I know, really! Don't hurt me any more.
Okay, okay! What do you want to know? Just don't hurt me again.
